text: The following manual will guide you through recipes and energy statistics about devices.
Every recipe that uses custom items

be crafted using the Heavy Workbench.

value.text: Primary ore for energy system components.
Found in the Overworld between Y=0 and Y=50
Smelt into Simplunium Ingots for crafting
Used to create: Batteries, Generators, Machines, Tools
